nRows = df.shape[0]
ser = df.count()
minimum_non_null_name = ser.idxmin()
minimum_non_null_value = ser.min()
if minimum_non_null_value < nRows:
    print(f'We have missing data\nthe column \'{minimum_non_null_name}\' and it has {nRows - minimum_non_null_value} null values')

def regionCodeExtractor(num):
    regionCode = str(num)[:3]
    return regionCode

regionCodes = df['phone-number'].apply(regionCodeExtractor)
regionCodes.value_counts().head(3)
